meanings.sent1: After work, he enjoyed a glass of booze to relax.
meanings.sent2: The bartender served a variety of booze to the customers.
meanings.sent3: The party was so wild that the booze seemed to disappear in minutes.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter echoed through the room, fueled by the booze in her hand.
meanings.sent5: The smell of booze lingered in the air, inviting everyone to join the celebration.

meanings.sent1: He tends to booze excessively at social gatherings.
meanings.sent2: They decided to booze all night to celebrate their victory.
meanings.sent3: The friends joked that they could booze for the Olympics.
meanings.sent4: The stress of the week made him want to booze until dawn.
meanings.sent5: She would often booze alone to forget her troubles.
